actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that an economic recovery program should include expenditures for certain State and local programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that any economic recovery program adopted by the Congress should provide specified amounts for the following State and local programs: (1) the Urban Parks and Recreation Recovery program; (2) certain planning and development programs on the State side of the Land and Water Conservation Fund; (3) the American Conservation Corps under the National Commission for National and Community Service; and (4) the Youth Conservation Corps program administered by the Departments of the Interior and of Agriculture.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that an economic recovery program should include expenditures for certain State and local programs.
